summary: A test suite that validates the functionality and edge‑case handling of Numba‑accelerated spectrogram augmentation kernels, including their gradient computation, large‑batch processing, and behavior when frequency or time masks are omitted or set to specific values.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of high‑performance audio augmentation components used in speech and audio machine‑learning pipelines, reducing regression risk and ensuring reliable data preprocessing.
